firework.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a small container filled with powder that burns or explodes to produce coloured lights and noise in the sky
firework.translation[0].definitions[0].e: a New Year’s Eve fireworks display
Jeff and David were in the back yard setting off fireworks.
firework.translation[0].definitions[1].d: used to say that someone will be angry
firework.translation[0].definitions[1].e: There’ll be fireworks if I get home late again.
firework.translation[0].definitions[2].d: something that is exciting or impressive
firework.translation[0].definitions[2].e: The real fireworks are provided by Shakespeare’s poetry.
